description: A single-day event focused on promoting physical, mental, and emotional well-being.

questions.label: What is the primary intention of your Wellness Day?
questions.placeholder: e.g., stress relief, physical health, mental awareness

questions.label: What is the event date and how many hours should it last?
Will the event be onsite, offsite, or virtual?
What is the desired tone of the day?
What types of sessions are you interested in including?
Would you like to include any physical activity sessions?
Will meals or snacks be provided? Include any dietary restrictions.
Do you want to allow time for unstructured breaks or social time?
Should the schedule include any team-based or collaborative elements?
